content: 1 fpdc around starting chain and first half_double_crochet both in the one fpdc not separately bpdc next stitch *fpdc around next stitch bpdc around next * repeat around join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc 70 round 22 &23 alternate fpdc and bpdc around join with a slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet 70 finish off and weave in ends if you crocheted over the beginning end when working around the elastic or chain be sure to go back and weave that one in as well to prevent unravelling skill level intermediate simple stripe messy bun hat skill level intermediate simple stripe messy bun hat pattern name place your huge charts here
